name: Bad Brew
description:
Controls:

Move Between rooms: Keys - 1, 2, 3, 4

Left-click to interact.
NOTE: Most anywhere you see a loading bar there will likely be something to click their upon completion.

Handling customers:
To handle customers you must brew potions and given them to customers. Customers will judge them based off what they're looking for. Green means correct material and position, yellow means correct material but incorrect position, red means incorrect material. This is handled left-to-right in regards to duplicate materials.  Upon getting all slots green the customer will pay for the potion, you'll need to collect the money from them.

Collecting more materials:
To collect more materials, collect pixies by left-clicking on them, then hold clikc and drag to convert their essence.
